blogPost.excerpt: Clean and clear UI Kit with necessary stuff to create design projects. It’s the simplest way to work with buttons, charts, inputs, and popups with saving huge amount of time. Let your workflow become pleasant and trust such things to Deca UI Kit.
blogPost.body: Clean and clear UI Kit with necessary stuff to create design projects. It’s the simplest way to work with buttons, charts, inputs, and popups with saving huge amount of time. Let your workflow become pleasant and trust such things to Deca UI Kit.
blogPost.title: Free Deca UI Kit - Clean UI Kit with necessary stuff to create design projects
blogPost.author: Andrey Pudov

localize.description: 干净、清晰的UI工具包，包含创建设计项目所需的内容。这是使用按钮、图表、输入和弹出窗口的最简单方式，可以节省大量时间。让您的工作流程变得令人愉快，并将这些东西托付给Deca UI Kit。
localize.tagline: 干净的UI工具包，包含创建设计项目所需的内容

localize.description: 乾淨、清晰的UI工具包，包含創建設計項目所需的內容。這是使用按鈕、圖表、輸入和彈出窗口的最簡單方式，可以節省大量時間。讓您的工作流程變得令人愉快，並將這些東西託付給Deca UI Kit。
localize.tagline: 乾淨的UI工具包，包含創建設計項目所需的內容

previous.excerpt: Are you lazy? Don’t have time for Linkedin? Meet Linvo. Linvo allows you to grow your network faster to achieve your goals more quickly. Instead of getting five connections every day and five messages. You get 80 connections every day and 80 messages.
previous.title: Linvo - Get more leads and sales on Linkedin

localize.description: 你懒惰吗？没有时间玩LinkedIn吗？见见林沃。Linvo使您可以更快地扩展网络，从而更快地实现目标。而不是每天收到五个连接和五条消息。你每天都会收到80个连接和80条消息。
localize.tagline: 在LinkedIn上获取更多线索和销售

localize.description: 你懶惰嗎？沒有時間玩LinkedIn嗎？見見林沃。Linvo使您可以更快地擴展網絡，從而更快地實現目標。而不是每天收到五個連接和五條消息。你每天都會收到80個連接和80條消息。
localize.tagline: 在LinkedIn上獲取更多線索和銷售

next.excerpt: SnapSmile is an app that uses your eating habits + images of your teeth to provide you with the insights, and recommendations you need to improve your oral health at home. Think of SnapSmile like your own Dental Coach.
next.title: SnapSmile - We use machine learning to help improve your dental health

localize.description: SnapSmilar是一款应用程序，它使用你的饮食习惯+你的牙齿图像，为你提供改善家里口腔健康所需的洞察力和建议。把SnapSmilar想象成你自己的牙科教练。
localize.tagline: 我们使用机器学习来帮助改善您的牙齿健康

localize.description: SnapSmilar是一款應用程序，它使用你的飲食習慣+你的牙齒圖像，爲你提供改善家裏口腔健康所需的洞察力和建議。把SnapSmilar想象成你自己的牙科教練。
localize.tagline: 我們使用機器學習來幫助改善您的牙齒健康
